artist: Artist: Igawa Sengai; Publisher: Nihon Mokuhan Insatsu Kabushikigaisha Hakkō
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: head and shoulders of woman, in profile from PL, wearing a blue kimono and green, silver and white obi; light blue ground
markings: 2 artist\'s seals; publisher: 日本木版印刷株式会社発行 {Nihon Mokuhan Insatsu Kabushikigaisha Hakkō} (Japan Woodblock Print Co.) | {Igawa Sengai gahaku hitsu}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Selection of New Ukiyo-e Beauties (Shin ukiyo-e bijin awase 新浮世絵美人合)
text: This design is part of the first set, published in 1918. There was a second set published in c. 1924.
title: August, Moon
